      • onDeregister

        public void onDeregister(QueryMetadata query)
        Description copied from interface: QueryEventListener
        Called when a query is removed from the registry. This happens either because the query was closed, in which case the query is stopped and its resources are destroyed, or the registry was closed, in which case the query is stopped and its resources _may_ be destroyed, depending on the flag passed to QueryRegistry.close.
        Specified by:
        onDeregister in interface QueryEventListener
        Parameters:
        query - the query that was deregistered
